accounts.name: aliasPda
docs: PDA to register Profile Alias (user can change Alias in the future - delete old PDA and create new one available)

docs: External Processor PDA that proof Processor passed to assign is whitelisted.
Must be passed if user want to assign Profile specified Processor for additional Connecting processing

accounts.name: registeringProcessor
docs: External processor that makes additional Profile Registerin processing
Must be passed if there is any assigned Processors in (App default or Profile specified)

instructions.name: createSubspace
docs: Create application Subspace owned by specified Profile (e.g. group or "public")
* `data` - A struct that holds Subspace data

docs: A PDA to claim Subspace alias - this way Subspace owner can change alias in the future (delete old PDA and create new one available)

docs: External Processor PDA that proof Processor passed to assign is whitelisted.
Must be passed if user want to assign Subspace specified Processor for additional Connecting processing

accounts.name: ExternalProcessorPDA
docs: ApprovedProcessorPDA holds data about every whitelisted Protocol external Processors

accounts.name: App
docs: App account for every protocol Application
1. Unique Application name (ID) as string (ASCII alphanumeric)

fields.name: registeringProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) that makes application Profile creation additional processing (33)

fields.name: connectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for profiles Connection additional processing (33)

fields.name: publishingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Creating additional processing (33)

fields.name: collectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Collecting additional processing (33)

fields.name: referencingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication referencing additional processing (33)

accounts.name: Profile
docs: Profile account that holds data about Application user
3. Unique Application's user Profile Alias as string (ASCII alphanumeric)

fields.name: connectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Connection additional processing (33)

accounts.name: Subspace
docs: The Subspace is an account (PDA) that holds data about a application Subspace (e.g. group / "public")
5. Unique application's user profile alias as string (optional, ASCII alphanumeric)

fields.name: publishingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Creating additional processing (33)

fields.name: connectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for profiles Connection additional processing (33)

fields.name: collectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Collecting additional processing (33)

fields.name: referencingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication referencing additional processing (33)

accounts.name: Publication
docs: The Publication is account (PDA) that holds Application's Publication data
2. Existing Protocol Application in which Publication was created
6. Subspace in which Publication being published
7. Whether or not the Publication is mirroring other existing Publication (e.g. re-post)
8. Whether or not the Publication is replying to other existing Publication (e.g. comment)
9. References to existing Publication if there is a mirror or reply (optional)

fields.name: metadataUri
docs: The URI of the publication metadata(STRING_LENGTH_PREFIX + MAX_URI_LENGTH)

fields.name: isMirror
docs: Flag to determine whether publication is mirror (e.g. 'repost') (1)

fields.name: isReply
docs: Flag to determine whether publication is reply (e.g. 'comment') (1)

fields.name: targetPublication
docs: Optional pubkey that specify target in case Publication is a mirror or reply (33)

fields.name: collectingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Collecting additional processing (33)

fields.name: referencingProcessor
docs: An address of a Program (external processor) for Publication Referencing additional processing (33)

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the Publication creation (8)

fields.name: modifiedAt
docs: The optional Unix timestamp of the Publication modification (9)

accounts.name: Connection
docs: Connection account holds data about Connection between two Application's entities (e.g. following)
4. Target Application's Profile/Subspace address (e.g. which initializer followed)
5. Whether or not Connection is approved by target (e.g. accept friend request)

fields.name: target
docs: Connection target Pubkey (might be another Profile or Aoolication Subspace) (32)

fields.name: approved
docs: Flag to determine whether Connection is approved by target entitty (e.g. accept friend request or private group acceptance) (1)

accounts.name: CollectionItem
docs: CollectionItem account that creates when some Profile collects some Application Entity (e.g. Publication)

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the CollectionItem creation (8)

accounts.name: Alias
docs: Alias account that creates when new Alias is claimed by user Profile or Subspace
2. Profile which the alias belongs to

accounts.name: Reaction
docs: Reaction account that creates when new Publication Reaction initialized

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the Reaction creation (8)

accounts.name: Report
docs: Report account that creates when new Report initialized

fields.name: createdAt
docs: Unix timestamp of the Report creation (8)

types.name: ProfileData
docs: 1. `alias` - Unique Application's user Profile Alias as string (ASCII alphanumeric)
3. `connecting_processor` - Profile specified external processor to make additional Connection Processing (optional)

types.name: SubspaceData
docs: 2. `alias` - Unique Application's Subspace Alias as string (ASCII alphanumeric)

types.name: PublicationData
docs: 3. `is_mirror` - Whether or not the publication is mirroring other existing publication (e.g. re-post)
4. `is_reply` - Whether or not the publication is replying to other existing publication (e.g. comment)

types.name: ConnectionTargetType
docs: Connection Target type (e.g. Profile or Subspace)

types.name: ContentType
docs: Content type that publication focus (e.g. short video)
1. Article - Article type (e.g. - mixed content / blog post)
4. Short video - Shor video file type

errors.name: ProcessorNameMustBeAlphanumeric
errors.msg: Processor name must contain only ASCII letters and numbers

errors.name: ProcessorNotWhitelisted
errors.msg: Procesor trying to use is not whitelisted

errors.name: AppNameMustBeAlphanumeric
errors.msg: Application name (ID) must contain only ASCII letters and numbers

errors.name: AliasMustBeAlphanumeric
errors.msg: Alias must contain only ASCII letters and numbers

errors.name: AliasAccountRequired
errors.msg: Alias account required to register action

errors.name: BothAliasAccountRequired
errors.msg: Both alias account required to update

errors.name: CurrentAliasAccountRequired
errors.msg: Current alias account required to delete

errors.name: BothMirrorAndReplyNotAllowed
errors.msg: Both mirroring and replying not allowed in the same time

errors.name: SelfPublicationCollecting
errors.msg: Forbidden to collect user's  own publication
